price: तथा जब उनसे कहा जाता है कि (अल्लाह के आगे) झुको, तो वे नहीं झुकते।
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
